documents.document:
Your Search For A Perfect Honeymoon Destination Stops Here

The state of Kerala is a gorgeous place to spend a time off. Kerala offer a multiplicity of holiday destination. We are going to view Kerala in form of a Honeymoon destination. The beaches, the backwaters and the thriving green hills of Kerala are great honeymoon destinations.

A Kerala honeymoon tours is a fantasy for some but we can make it all come true. All you have to do is pack your bags and give us a call. Let it be the beaches or the backwaters, we will create a perfect honeymoon plan.

The lush green hills of Munnar are of divine beauty. Couples opting for a good honeymoon must visit Munnar during their stay in Kerala. The green tea gardens are the first attraction on the hills of south India. Visitors are offered a welcome drink which is tea of a finest blend. A slow walk around the tea garden holding hand of your love is a passionate scene. You can click candid photos of your darling which remind you of your honeymoon in the coming years. We are all fascinated by echoes. There is an echo point in Munnar and it’s a fun place. You can shout the name of your beloved and hear it back again numerous times. The waterfalls in Munnar are splendid.

Another important tourist attraction in Kerala is the beaches. The white sandy beaches, the swaying tall palm trees and the crystal clear water of the Arabian Sea sets the mood for a perfect for a honeymoon. There are no other sounds to be heard except for the splashing of the waves. The view of crimson sunset over the horizon makes you feel alive. A beach side candle light dinner under the velvet sky, a bottle of champagne in the ice bucket, and two champagne saucers by the table side and a love song as background music... Romantic, it’s it?

A honeymoon on a house boat will be an exclusive experience. The luxury house boats of Kerala honeymoon are known all around the world for its uniqueness. One can reserve a house boat for their honeymoon. The house boat provides for a comfortable stay with modern facilities and great service. These house boats float on the backwaters of Kerala. Since Kerala is connected with a vast network of backwaters, it creates an easy access to some of the major cities of Kerala. The green paddy fields with coconut trees dancing with the wind are an incredible sight to see. The emerald backwaters create a special bond for which tourist come to visit it year after year.

Honeymoon in Kerala is all about great experience. There are so many destination to choose in India but why Kerala? To answer this question you will have to visit Kerala first. The name “god’s own country” truly represents Kerala. Beauty of Kerala cannot be described in mere words.

Find more information at http://www.keralahoneymoon.org/

Visit God’s Own Habitat on Your Auspicious Occasion of Hon

Honeymoon plays very dominant role in any couple’s life which always needs privacy. There are several destinations across the world having their great features but if you are looking for a destination in India, then look no further than Kerala globally known God’s Own Country. Mother-nature has gifted this state with such amazing attractions whose significance is just beyond the words and visual descriptions. Not only among honeymoon couples but it is equally popular among nature-lovers, adventure-thrillers, and many. It is one such state of India where one can observe the presence of God while gazing several stunning colors of nature. Due to immense beauty and all time pleasurable climatic conditions, it is crowned as one of the ten paradises and fifty must seen destination in the world by national geographical traveler magazine.

Right from refreshing hill stations, scenic backwaters, wildlife national parks, lagoons to palm-fringed beaches, if offers everything to the nature-lovers. Planning and celebrating honeymoon in this state is just like a dream comes true as it has everything to double your romance. Along with its natural attractions, Kerala is equally popular for its unique culture, mouth-watering cuisine, hospitable people and excellent hotels and accommodations.

Most of the attractions of this state are quite similar like other tropical places but backwaters of the state are really exclusive and quite popular for its scenic beauty. Backwaters are the perfect combination of brackish lagoons, lakes, inlets and several rivers which team up together and forms the breathtaking locale that can be only experienced through well-organized houseboats also known as Kettuvallams in traditional language. Kerala honeymoon will not be completed unless you do not go for backwater houseboat cruise takes tourists in the stunning world of water and wonders and leave them spellbind. In one side where backwaters are popular for their picturesque landscapes on the other hands houseboats are well renowned for their facilities which are not less than any luxurious hotel.

Some of the essential features of houseboats include bath-attached deluxe rooms, lounge, deck, kitchenette and many others. Earlier houseboats were only used for the transportation purposes but later after considering the huge influx of tourists for backwaters these houseboats were modified with contemporary facilities as we have mentioned above. Kumarakom, Alleppey, Cochin, Kottayam, Trivandrum and etc are the few backwater destinations of Kerala.

Well beaches have always fascinating by honeymooners and if you are looking for most romantic beaches then also it would be the best place to you. Kerala is blessed with innumerable amazing beaches fringed by coconut and palm trees. Some of the finest beaches that can be explored during honeymoon Kerala tour include Varkala, Kovalam and many more.

If there is any other thing that really makes Kerala unique then its stunning hill stations majestically located at western-Ghats. Among numerous hill stations of this state Munnar is considered an ideal place for honeymoon gives tourists a remarkable honeymoon experience. Scenic landscapes, meandering rivers, mesmerizing waterfalls, vast tea gardens and ranges of floras and faunas make Munnar one of the finest hill stations in the planet. Some of the best attractions that can be explored during Munnar honeymoon are Eravikulam National Park, Devikulam, Rajamalai and many more.

Find more information at http://www.keralahoneymoon.org/

Australia- The Interminable Adventure Planet for Tourist

Australia is a renowned top holiday sites of the world which has the power to capture the attention of every tourist. It is considered to be a paradise estate for nature lover to enjoy the bountiful sceneries and wonders of nature. If you are looking for paradise of blue sea and glacier mountain there is none other site like the country of Australia. The country is benchmarked for its incredible adventure sites possess with excellent host of activities offered in it.

Sydney, cairns, Canberra, Melbourne and Greenland are some of the interesting mind blowing sites of Australia which will surely gratify your excitement and keep you in love with nature. Australia package tour is one of the best ways to explore the incredible wonders and attractions found in it and they are some of the outstanding trip opportunities provided by the country for unforgettable tour experiences.

Sydney

A popular striking city well known as the jewel of the South Pacific is an international city. It is one of the most widely visited sites of Australia for its irreplaceable cultural attractions of diverse culture and ethnic blend which magnetize thousands of tourists almost every year. The impressive of the blue point reserve, bounty cruises, circular Quay, Cronulla beachside suburb and darling harbor are the sparks of this particular city.

Cairns

Cairns is also one of the most sought after destination and worth visited sites which should not be miss out in Tour to Australia. It is one of the UESCO listed world heritage sites of the appealing tropical rain forest and Great Barrier Reef which internationally acclaimed for its unparallel beauty and attraction that magnetizes tourist even from the remote corners of the world by its unbeatable outstanding scenery bestow by nature. Cairns Night Zoo Safari, White Water Rafting and Rainforest Cableway trip are some of the hotly pursuing activities for tourist visitors and holiday makers to experience fun amidst the unrealistic images of the world.

Canberra

This vibrant city is blessed with plethora of attractions and charms which are beyond words to express. It is the capital city of this country which has the excellent capacity to entertain every visitor and delight them to the hearts content. Being the capital city numerous prominent and outstanding sites are available such as the Australia War Memorial, New Parliament House, Lake Burley, National Gallery of Australia and Australian Botanical Gardens. So, this place deserves to be visited by every tourist visitors to experience the wonders and true color of this country of Australia.

Other places such as Melbourne and Greenland are also some of the prominent and notable tourist places which has push the tourism of Australia to its highest level with its spell bound nature and wealth gifted in these sites. For example Melbourne, a city well known as the garden city with unique appealing character of diverse cultural attractions and traditional facilities make the place alluring and tempting for every traveler to undertake and experience them.

The Gold Coast, great Ocean Road, Perth and Tasmania are also some of the interesting hang out sites which a sure you of unforgettable tour time experience. Take a look and prepare for its mesmerizing fun fill outing for life time cherishment.

The Author is an online Marketer. He loves to write articles and Blogs. He has written thousands of blogs over internet. He loves to write about Australia Tourism. Find more packages at http://www.australiatourpackages.org/

Australia- A Land Forever Tourist Paradise on Earth

Australia, a country located in the southern hemisphere which is comprised of the mainland of Australia continent as well as the islands of Tasmania along with numerous beautiful strips of small islands along the Indian Ocean and Pacific Oceans forms this awesome paradise land of Australia. It is one of the most popular tourist destinations sought after by international tourist from different parts of the world.

Thought it is the smallest continent compared with the other continents of the world, Australia takes the world’s preference taking up as one of the prominent international business hub of the world. It is a highly developed country and ranks top in many international comparisons of national performance such as quality of life, health, education, economic freedom and protection from the civil liberties and political rights. Thus the country gains incredible attention of people worldwide.

And so Australia tourism outstands in many of the business field with the increase of tourist attraction to eye witness the independent country of its own world.

Some of the prominent sites widely frequented by tourist in Australia are numbered in few below:

Sydney

This particular destination of Australia is an international face renowned for numerous important sites. The Opera House, Marina Aquarium at Darling Harbor, Jenolan Caves and the Hunter Valley of wineries with Blue Mountains are some of the excellent tour hot spots of Sydney. Dinners at the Harbor Highlights Cruise and outback snapshots are some of the tourist favorite activities which linger for years.

Perth

It is one of the most enjoyable fun fill sites where you can experience the various ranges of attractions and activities. The attraction ranges from sightseeing to aquatic fun and adventure expedition. Tourism in Australia also gives you an opportunity to explore the incredible marine world by offering the most spectacular view of Perth skyline, the sunset reflecting glass skyscrapers. It also takes you to the amazing world of the Art Gallery of Western Australia, Western Australian Museum, Cultural Centre and Kings Theatre. Thus Perth is crowded almost every by tourist visitors from different corners of the world.

Cairns and the Great Barrier Reef

The Great Barrier Reef of Cairns is the world’s largest coral reef listed among the most wonderful World Heritage Sites on earth. This particular site which stretches along Queensland coast of the Queensland’s most northerly city is the most amazing world of marine life. People often come for weekend outing and vacation tours to this place. It is also one of the most favorable sites for accommodation where you will find numerous hotels and resorts offering top luxurious resort at the most affordable cheap rate. You will surely find delight and satisfaction of Australia tourism from this place.

Other must visit prominent tourist destinations of this country are Tasmania, Fraser Island and Gold Coast are some of the famous tourist places that you should not miss out whenever you visit Australia for vacation and tours.

Make tours to Australia interesting and special for special occasions such as honeymoon outing, family vacation spending and other leisure escape with tour packages for best experience. So, to make the tour more enjoyable and memorable consult with one of the leading Australia Tour Operators and explore the enigmatic tourist’s places of this beautiful Australia with immense pleasure and joy.

Author is an eminent analyst and writer in Travel & Tourism related topics. He has authored many books on tour guide for Australia Weather. Find more information at http://www.australiatourism.org.in/

Kerala the Most Romantic Destination to Enjoy your Honeymoon

There are many definitions of honeymoon but no one knows its significance more than honeymoon couples. This beautiful and auspicious occasion commence just after the huge pomp of marriage ceremony. Well if you are newly married couples or either simply looking for an exotic honeymoon destination where you can take your partner and spend some quality time together then look no further than Kerala located at south-western part of India, truly a visitor’s paradise.

World-renowned as ‘God’s Own Country’ and declared one of the ten paradises in the world by National Geographical Traveler magazine, it is an ideal holidaying destination for those who wish to spend their vacations in the lap of mother-nature. Every year from every part of the world people visits this state just to gaze the beautiful colors of nature. A visitor’s paradise Kerala is a place like no other destination in the world.

Stunning and invigorating hill stations, tropical greenery, lush green meadows, palm-fringed beaches, wildlife national reserves, and picturesque backwaters are the few attractions that make Kerala really a paradise in the planet. In terms of natural attractions it really has not any competitor in the world. Besides there are so many things that makes Kerala popular and unique such as its warm and friendly people, exotic food, incredible culture and excellent hotels and resorts gives all the amenities to the visitors and give them an unforgettable holidaying experience.

While on trip to this green paradise if there is something which really tempts tourists then its fascinating culture and healing Ayurvedic therapy gives complete relaxation to the body and soul of the individual. Be here and immerse yourself with the enigmatic beauty of this green state and make your relation an unending and everlasting honeymoon experience. The essential features of honeymoon in Kerala include thrilling wildlife safari, beach tour, backwater houseboat cruise and hill stations trip too.

No wonder but being a tropical state Kerala is gifted with innumerable refreshing hill stations, all are worth to explore during honeymoon trip in this state. Among innumerable hill stations of Kerala, Munnar is very popular popularly called Kashmir in south set on the western-Ghats.
Picturesque landscapes, lush green meadows, meandering waterfalls, vast tree gardens, wildlife parks, meandering rivers and ranges of floras and faunas makes Munnar most romantic and stunning. Due to its immense beauty and all time pleasurable climatic conditions it was once the summer gateway of Britishers. Munnar is speckled with ranges of attractions and destinations having their great features. Some of the best attractions in and around Munnar are Devikulam, Mattupetti, Rajamalai, Eravikulam National Park and many more. Due to its pleasant climatic conditions and several trekking trails it is also considered an ideal place for several adventure and fun-filled activities.

Kerala Honeymoon would not be completed unless you do not explore its picturesque backwaters which made with the perfect combination of brackish lagoons, lakes, inlets and several rivers which team up together and forms the breathtaking locale. To explore these picturesque backwaters you can hire country’s houseboats also known as Kettuvallams in traditional language offers all the luxuries to the visitors including bath-attached rooms, lounge, deck, Kitchenette and many more.

Author is an eminent analyst and writer in Travel & Tourism related topics. He has authored many books on tour guide for Honeymoon Kerala. Find more information at http://www.keralahoneymoon.org/

Down Under and its Astounding and fascinating Tourist Destin

Australia is truly the most beautiful and wonderful country which is lovingly called as ‘Down Under’. This astounding country is beautifully situated between the gorgeous Pacific and Indian Ocean which easily allure the tourist from every nook and corner of the entire world. These astounding destinations easily allure tourist from every nook and corner of the world. Australia is thus the country which easily allures the vacationers with its great and big tourist attractions and destinations. Truly this country is very worth to visit and explore as it is truly speckled with numerous big and great attractions which truly is very beautiful and its beauty is beyond imagination. Beside these this wonderful country is also dotted with numerous UNESCO World Heritage Sites which truly are very worth to visit and explore on your vacation to this fascinating country.

This wonderful destination easily attracts all sorts of vacationers and from every length and breadth of the world. This astounding tourist destination has rich culture, unique traditions, rich heritage and colorful festivals and fairs easily allure the vacationers to this country throughout the year.

Some of the major tourist destination which truly are very worth to visit and explore on your visit to Australia and which easily enhance the beauty of tourism in Australia are such as listed below:

Great Barrier Reef

This is world largest coral reef and is truly a wonder that cannot be missed as you are in Australia. The Great Barrier Reef here stretches down the east coast of the country which consists of over 900 islands and 3000 individual reef. The Great Barrier Reef is giant as this wonder may also be seen from the outer space & this is also listed as UNESCO World Heritage Sites. The Reef stretches over 85 million acres along the Northern East of Australia and is bliss for the water, nature lovers and for the divers. This Reef is home to 1500 species of fishes and this attraction leave visitors spell bound on their visit to this continent.

Melbourne

No tour to Australia is ever considered as worth and complete one until Melbourne Australia tour is explored. Melbourne in this country is truly the most fascinating and wonderful country which easily attracts the vacationers from every nook and corner of the entire world. It is the second largest country which is located in the southeastern corner of Australia. This city is truly very active and warm hearted as it welcomes all the tourist and vacationers from all over the globe for their fun filled and delightful vacation. This city in Australia is filled with exciting colors, liveliness, excitement and so much warmth as Melbourne will always tempt you to visit this city again and again. Some of the major tourist attractions and destination to visit in Melbourne are such as Melbourne Cricket Ground, Melbourne Zoo, Collins Street, Kings Domain, Royal Arcade, Flinders Street Station, Melbourne Central Shopping Center and many alike which truly are wonderful to explore.

Well these is not only that can be explored with any Australia package tour with the help of any Australia travel guide, there are numerous sheer wonders which truly leave the vacationers spell bound on your visit to exotic Australia.

Author is an eminent analyst and writer in Travel & Tourism related topics. He has authored many books on tour guide for Australia Travel Guide and Australia travel agents. Find more information at http://www.australiatourism.org.in/

Visit Australia and Find Incomparable Attractions with Its T

Are you planning for vacations and looking for an exotic overseas holidaying destination if yes then look no further than Australia, one of the most sought after tourist destination, fascinates tourists from every nook and corner of the world, all the year round. It is country that has a whole continent to itself. World-renowned for its natural treasures, wide open spaces, romantic beaches, exotic deserts, ‘the bush’, and the outback’ Australia is actually one of world’s most highly urbanised countries.

Apart from its breathtaking natural attractions, it is also well-known for the cosmopolitan attractions of its large cities such as Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Perth. It is one such country where there is no dearth of attractions and enjoyment any more but here one can find the perfect blend in natural attractions as well as true cosmopolitan culture. Every year, tourists from across the world people visit this country in a great numbers with different holidaying purpose. Whatever is your purpose of visiting and exploring this country it perfectly knows how to make it possible in this country.

Apart from its hearth-gripping natural attractions and magnificent destinations, there are many other things that give this country an international recognition and enhance its popularity world-wide such as its exotic resorts, excellent transportation facilities, warm-friendly people, unique culture and excellent luxurious hotels and accommodations. It is the smallest continent but sixth largest country by area. This stunning is bordered to the west by the Indian Ocean, and to the east by the South Pacific Ocean. The essential features of Australia package tour include beach tour, wildlife tour, amazing sightseeing tour, culture heritage tour and many more. There are so many interesting things that one can experience in this country.

This amazing continent country is bestowed with such amazing attractions whose significance is just beyond the words and visual delight but all are worth-visiting at least once in a lifetime span. If your interest lies in nature then you can explore the magnificent natural attractions like silver-sandy beaches, wildlife national parks, turquoise blue water, exotic deserts and etc apart from there are numerous world-renowned cities which are popular for their true cosmopolitan or metropolis culture. Though Australia is full of several attractions and destinations but to explore all of them is however not very possible thus we are presenting the top notch attractions that one can explore during Australia tours.

Great Barrier Reef
It is one of the most sought attractions and frequently visited by tourists. Great Barrier Reef is a natural wonder and also a UNESCO World Heritage site tempts tourists to visit there from different parts of the world. It is an ideal holidaying destination for those who wish to experience marine life. Dwarf Minke Whale, Indo-Pacific Humpback Dolphin, Flatback Turtle, Olive Ridley Turtle and Salt Water Crocodile are some of the species found here.

Sydney Harbor
Well if you are passionate photographer and wish to capture beautiful things in your cam then must visit to this place well-renowned photographed landmarks having world’s largest steel arch bridge draws the attention of many tourists.

Apart from here are many other attractions that one can explore through Australia tour package such as Uluru or Ayers Rock, Perth and many more.

Find more information at http://www.australiatourpackages.org/

Visit God’s Abode during Honeymoon Kerala

Globally famed God’s Own Country, Kerala is one of the most sought after tourist destination located at south-western part of India. Nature has gifted this state with such amazing beauty whose significance is just beyond the words and visual delight. Every year from across the world, people visit this state in a great numbers with different holidaying objective, be it honeymoon, family holiday, adventure or any other. It is one such state where one can find almost every colour of nature in the form of invigorating blue hills, palm-fringed beaches, largest lagoons, picturesque backwaters, wildlife national parks and ranges of floras and faunas. Due to its enigmatic beauty and incomparable attractions it is crowned as one of the paradise and fifty must see destinations in the world by National Geographical traveller magazine.

Every year from across the world people visit this state in a great number just to experience the nature by close. Along with its several attractions there are many other things that give this place a global recognition and enhance its popularity world-wide such as its mouth-watering cuisine, warm-friendly people, unique culture and excellent five star hotels and accommodations renders almost every facilities to the visitors.

Some of the best things that one can experience during honeymoon Kerala include thrilling, wildlife safari, beach tour, romantic backwater houseboat voyage, and hill stations tour. Most of the people wonder to know that Kerala is home to several invigorating hill stations, which is exactly true. Being a tropical state, it is bestowed with such amazing hill stations whose significance and splendour is just beyond the words and visual descriptions.

Among several hill stations of this state, Munnar, fondly called Kashmir of south is the most sought after hill station majestically set on the western-Ghats. Picturesque landscapes, sprawling grasslands, wildlife parks, vast tea gardens, zigzag paths and several magnificent colonial bungalows make Munnar a finest hill station in the world. The summer capital of Britishers, Munnar is frequently visited by visitors. Some of the best attractions that one can explore in and around Munnar include Devikulam, Rajamalai, Eravikulam National Park, Echo-Point and many others. Due to several romantic trekking trails and all time soothing climactic conditions, it is also considered an ideal place for several adventure and fun-filled activities.

Apart from there are many other attractions that one can explore during Kerala honeymoon such as backwater houseboat cruise takes tourists in the stunning world of water and wonders. Several rivers, lakes, lagoons and inlets merge up together and forms the breath-taking backwaters that can be explored through well-organized houseboats also known as Kettuvallams in traditional language. A houseboats play a predominant role in backwater tour takes tourists in their dream land and fills their heart with joy and ecstasy. Some of the great features of houseboats include bath-attached rooms, lounge, deck, kitchenette and many more. Kumarakom, Alleppey, Kottayam, Cochin and etc. are the few places where you can go for backwater houseboat cruise.

Apart from there are attractions that one can explore and experience during honeymoon in Kerala such as thrilling wildlife tour, beach tour, cultural tour and etc.

Find more information at http://www.keralahoneymoon.org/

Kerala an Awesome Natural State in India

Kerala the strip of land in the Indian state is mainly famous for its rich cultural heritage which cannot be found anywhere else in the world. The religion and the art of this charming place are so beautiful and prosperous that it lures many tourists from across the world. People from the far away countries are very much interested to know and explore the Kerala’s cultural heritage, religion, art and the dance forms. Kerala with its exotic beaches, Evergreen Mountain, extensive backwaters, swaying palm trees, dense forest, blue lagoon, and swift flowing rivers looks like a dreamland. Along with the beaches and the backwaters its main attraction is its pristine hill stations which offers the tourists with cool atmosphere and refreshes the mind, body, and soul of the tourists and the visitors.

Kerala one of the most vibrant and beautiful holidaying destination in India is famous throughout the world for Honeymoon tours. Kerala Honeymoon tours take you to the interesting places in Kerala and also an opportunity to explore Kerala and its pristine natural beauty. The extravagant beaches, exotic backwaters, swift flowing rivers, blue lagoon, dense forest and the ever green mountains fill the honeymooners with awe and wonder. It also gives them the chance to spend some memorable time in the unmatched beauty and atmosphere of this magical land. This place is truly a honeymooner’s paradise and it provides the couples with almost everything that they would be expecting for.

Kerala blessed with the unmatched beauty of the nature and its beautiful environment is often referred to as honeymooner’s paradise. There are many Honeymoon places in Kerala which will surely leave the tourists with wonder and surprise. Kerala beaches are the most romantic and sensuous place for the newly married couple, they can celebrate their honeymoon in seclusion with the romantic sea waves touching their feet. The candle light dinner along the seashore is the most romantic moment that anyone can think of and the Kerala beaches are finest place to be in this scenario. The refreshing Hill stations and the exotic wildlife sanctuaries are the second option for the honeymooners to visit. The cool atmosphere and the freshness of these hill stations fill the air with romanticism and make it a perfect place to spend for the newly married couples. The couples can also enjoy the attractions like colorful festivals, heritage attraction and their rich culture and heritage.

In everyone’s life Honeymoon is the best moment of their life and it should be celebrated in a very special and memorable way so that they can cherish it for a life time. Kerala is famous for its extravagant backwaters which add an extra beauty to the state; it is also an excellent honeymoon spot with all the beauties of nature. Kerala backwater honeymoon is like dream coming true. The backwaters in Kerala are awesome, solitude and offers privacy to the honeymooners, it is an absolutely perfect place to celebrate honeymoon. The swaying coconut and the evergreen trees behind the backwaters look attractive and provide a romantic environment which is very much admired and liked by the honeymooners. The celebration of the honeymoon is even better in the houseboats.

Find more information at http://www.keralahoneymoon.org/

Visit Australia and Find Its Heart-Gripping Attraction Place

Though, as a country, it is the sixth largest of its kind in the world.

Visit this country and explore the charm and beauty of the nature. Some of the best natural attractions that one explore during visiting this country include golden beaches, scenic natural surrounding, refreshing hills, exotic wildlife parks, pristine lagoons, and ranges of floras and faunas. Every year from different parts of the world, people visit this country in a great numbers with different holidaying purpose. Whatever is your purpose of visiting be it family-holiday, honeymoon, or adventure, it perfectly knows how to make it possible in this country. It is one such country where there is no dearth of attractions and enjoyment any more. Some of the best attractions that one should explore during visiting this country include Great Barrier Reef, Sydney Harbor Bridge, Sydney Opera House, and Fraser Island, Queensland, Canberra the capital city of the country and Melbourne.

World-renowned for its cosmopolitan and vibrant atmosphere, Melbourne Australia tour is getting very popular among visitors draws the attention of many from different parts of the world. Melbourne is undoubtedly a city worth exploring; it is Australia’s events capital, its sporting hub and the country’s heartland, home to great theatre music, throbbing nightlife, great shopping, and excellent restaurants. Its significance and splendour is just beyond the words and visual delight.

It is an ideal holidaying place for those who are interested in culture, entertainment, great Australian wines, festivals and fine dining restaurants. The path to Melbourne is magnificent no matter which direction you approach the city. Some of the best attractions that one can explore in this city include Melbourne Zoo, Luna Park, St Kilda Sea, Baths, St Paul Cathedral, Gasworks Arts Park and etc. due to huge influx of tourists every year in this city, there are special arrangements of hotels and accommodations for tourists renders almost every facilities to the visitors.

Well there are many other attractions of tourist’s interest in this country and if you wish to explore the great miracle of nature then must head to the Great Barrier Reef considered an essential part of Australia packages. One of the Australia’s most remarkable natural gifts, the Great Barrier Reef is bestowed with the heart-gripping beauty of the world’s largest coral reef.
The reef holds an abundance of marine life and comprises of 3000 individual reefs systems and coral cays and literally hundreds of picturesque tropical islands with some of the world’s most stunning soaked, silver-sandy beaches.

Apart from there are many other things that brings this country into limelight and enhance the popularity of Australia tourism world-wide such as its warm-friendly people, exotic beach resorts, and excellent luxurious five-star hotels and accommodations.

Places to Visit in Kerala during Honeymoon

Kerala is a wonderful breathtaking state created by nature. Blessed with the scenic beauty of nature marvels of the picturesque hills, scintillating backwater and romantic beaches with abundant flora and fauna is a perfect site for those who keep eye on nature excitement to grabs and take hold of opportunity to relish nature. Today Kerala has emerged as a paradise hub for honeymoon purpose.

Kerala is an Indian state located on the Malabar Coast of south-west India. It is one of the most impressive states with the highest Human Development Index with top attractive eco-tourism services. Its tourism is popular for its outstanding attractions and services offered by the state along with the tourism of the nation. Its tourism is highly progressive and is demanded by international tourist worldwide.

The popular and fame of the state is credited for its unbeatable nature attractions and possibilities found in it coupled with excellent tourism amenities rendered in it. At present it is the top leading tourist destination of India drawing the attention of thousands and millions of tourist spreading its name far and wide across the globe. The backwater, beaches, wildlife abodes and tropical greenery sites are the top rated honeymoon places in Kerala that attracts the most number of tourists almost every year.

Some of the highly recommended honeymoon possible perfects sites are Kovalam, one of the most sought after beach destination for ayurvedic, cuisines and beach serene life and Munnar, a well known magic spell tea estate hill station which can capture the attention and drench mind and soul to the unrealistic world of nature paradise pleasure. Other mesmerizing wonderful places to visit in Kerala are given below. You can take the help of tour operators and explore the incredible awesome sites for a perfect honeymoon expedition to experience.

Kovalam honeymoon can take you to the excitement of amazing serene beach site of only the breeze and palm rusting sound along with waves of sea gives a relaxing health regain. Take a trip with its packages and enjoy the resorts wonderful mind blowing services of ayurvedic treatment, massages, spa enjoyment and beauty grooming excitement for experience of the most delightful trip ever.

Munnar honeymoon packages too offers similar health rejuvenating facilities but in the most dramatic way. It gives chance to every visitor to relax and take pleasure and enjoy by indulging with nature face to face. There are lots of activities and excitement provided by tourism for couples. Check out the packages and go for it according to your interest and desire. Options are given according to the interest and attitude which will make their purpose achievable with personal packages.

But if you go for the places like Kumarakom and Thekkady, its honeymoon tour packages will soak you to the full exhilaration and delight. They offer incredible adventure excitement such as backwater cruise amidst the endless palm fringe boulevard canals of lakes, exploring jungles and wildlife with jungle safari and elephant ride and many other mind blowing awesome things to do.

So if you are planning for Kerala honeymoon to proceed always refer for honeymoon tour packages and do not miss out each and every attractions of Kerala tourism.

Find more information at http://www.keralahoneymoon.org/

Australia the Smallest Continent with Big Surprises

Australia the smallest continent of the world is an interesting place to visit. Located on the southern hemisphere below the continent of Asia, Australia has a very interesting history. Ruled by the East India Company, Australia was a convict depot during the colonial era. Convicts were transferred from all the way from England to Australia and were set free to construct their own livelihood. Before Australia was a barren desert island now it’s one of the highly urbanized continents in the world.

Australia tourism offers a wide range of recreational activities for the visitors. The snow capped mountains, picturesque landscapes, sun kissed beaches, tropical rain forest, deserts, exotic wildlife and rare collection of flora and fauna all combines together to make Australia a sought after tourist destination in the world. The island continent is constituted of six states namely Victoria, Queensland, New South Wales, Western Australia, South Australia and Tasmania.

The major cities of Australia that are known for its tourist destinations are Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Canberra, Adelaide, Hobart etc. Each city in Australia has its own contrasting set of things to do and places to see. However some of the places to see in Australia are:-

Great Barrier Reef: The largest coral reef system stretching over two thousand and six hundred kilometres from the Pacific to the tip of Queensland. Declared a World Heritage Site by the UNESCO in 1981 the Great Barrier Reef is an amazing tourist spot. The Reef is inhabited by many animal species and micro organism and is a great place for swimming, snorkelling, fishing and Deep Sea diving.

Sydney Harbour: The inlet to the South Pacific Ocean is a natural harbour with the mesmerizing backdrop view of the Sydney Opera House a World Heritage Site and the Sydney Harbour Bridge. Water activities such as sailing, fishing, scuba diving makes the harbour a well frequented place for both local and the tourists.

Melbourne: The most stylish of city of Australia is a blend of both Victorian and modern architecture genius. The Melbourne sky diving centre gives you an opportunity to skydive. A plane takes you to a height of 13,000 meters then you dive. You breath comes to a halt and then the fun unfolds. The bird’s eye view of the Melbourne city is astounding. Come and have an adrenal rushing experience that you won’t forget till date. Grab a bite of the mouth watering delicacies in the Federation square and the New Quay.

Mount Kosciuszko: A mountain located in the Snowy Mountains in Kosciuszko National Park the highest mountain in the continent. The sown destination of Australia in winter invites skiers from all around the globe. Once in the region take time to visit the Ningaloo Marine Park, Pound National Park, Glen Helen, Ormiston Gorge and the legendary Finke River.

The Great Ocean Road by the name suggests is a wide road which runs along the southern coast of Australia. The great Ocean Road is one of the most beautiful driving roads on earth. Its length of the road is two hundred and fifty kilometres and starts from the Trecky Surf Resort. The main attraction includes Loren, Apollo Bay, Port Fairy, Otway National Park and Campbell National Park.

Australian weather is mysterious. Since Australia is a vast county the weather varies from place to place. Charismas is celebrated in Australia is celebrated in the mid of summer season, this is the magic of Australia. Come and visit Australia for a phenomenal experience and take home memories of the fascinating island continent.

Some of the marvelous sightseeing spots, destinations and attractions which allure the honeymooners with any honeymoon packages in Kerala are such as listed below:

Kerala Climate

As the beautiful state is located on the Malabar Coast of the South West portion in India, this state shows diversity of climate throughout the year. Well due to the varieties in its geographical features Kerala experiences equatorial type of climate, thus this state is not one month destination but can be visited throughout the year. The western lowlands and the coastal plain remains hot and humid throughout the year while on the other hand the eastern highlands including the predominant mountain regions remains and enjoy cool and refreshing climate throughout the year. There are annually four types of seasons in Kerala, which include summer, south west monsoon, winter and north east monsoon.

Beaches

Though India is not the beach destination but it is blessed by the numerous wonderful scintillating beaches which easily entice all the newlywed couples for their most romantic and fun filed vacation. The beaches truly invite all the couples from every nook and corner of the entire world. Among the numerous beaches the Kovalam beach is the most beautiful and the most sought after vacationers from all over the globe. This picturesque beach destination is located just 18 km away from the capital city of Kerala, Trivandrum. Kovalam beach is truly beautifully blessed by the swaying palm trees, glistering silvery sands and the exotic beach resorts and the wonderful hotels easily attracts the honeymooners on their Kerala honeymoon.

Some of the incredible tourism attractions that are worth to visit and explore during Kerala honeymoon tours are Munnar, Alleppey, Kumarakom, Kasargod, Kollam, Kuttanad and many more. Some of the interesting and alluring tourism place where couples can enjoy with outmost joy and happiness are mentioned as below:

Munnar

Located in the charming lap of the Western Ghats near to the confluence of the three Mountain Rivers, Munnar in Kerala is one of the most sought after and preferred holidaying destination. It is enigmatically blessed and has so many alluring and charming tourism places where couples can enjoy with maximum delights and take back home lots of incredible memories to relish in forever.

Some of the tempting and alluring tourism attractions that are worth to visit and explore during Munnar tours are Pothamedu, Devikulam, Attukal, Anaimudi Peak, Thattekad Bird Sanctuary, Top Station, Echo Point, Chinnar Wildlife Sanctuary and Marayoor. These are some of the alluring and most sought after tourist attractions that are worth to visit and explore during Munnar tours. Truly speaking Munnar is surely going to make your Kerala honeymoon tours and exciting and everlasting experience of lifetime.

Thekkady – Periyar

If you love nature and want to soak in its splendour, Thekkady also called Periyar is the perfect place to visit. It is amazingly beautiful and is one of the most sought after and preferred holidaying destination, where you can enjoy with maximum fun and delights. Here couples can see various species of animals, birds, rich flora and fauna and more importantly and picturesque landscapes enveloped delightfully in the emerald greenery. Thekkady in Periyar is the perfect place to visit and no wonder due to its evergreen charm and beauty, Thekkady honeymoon packages has become much popular and much more in demand for honeymoon tours.

Beside these there are several other honeymoon places in Kerala which are worth to visit and explore during honeymoon tours. So book the exiting and alluring honeymoon packages from Kerala and enjoy the vacation of lifetime in the bounty of the nature and start the beginning of the married life with immense pleasure and delights.
